posts.author: Theophilus Fist
posts.content:
Was musing about arcane casters (which, except for Bard, I rarely play) and thinking about how the right combo of HP, damage shields and DR, could make a damned fine melee arcanist.  JUST to make it interesting for me, I wrapped my ideas around incorporating the most worthless (IMO) Prestige Class in the game - Purple Dragon Knight - for kicks, giggles and as a way to add AB without the cheesiness of only using a few levels of a Prestige Class.

The toon has to get hit enough to let the shields damage the attacker, yet have enough HP to survive and will probably need other ways to damage the bad guy besides the shields (either a big sword or a high damage spell), so that speaks Dwarf to me.

I kicked around two quick thoughts - W25/DD10/PDK5 "Purple Defender of Death!" with Mestil's Acid Sheath, Dwarven Defender DR,  Elemental Shield, IGMS & Finger of Death to neutralize baddies & BD25/RDD10/PDK5 "Purple Dragon of Death!" with extended Wounding Whispers, EDR 3, Full Bard song & AB in the 40s.  I built both versions but didn't look to optimize.  I also have NO IDEA as to whether any of the PDK feats will be useful.

Additionally, a BD25/DD10/PDK5 (not RDD) seems like it would work best, except there'd be at least 2 alignment changes, which I do not want.

1) PvM
2) Level cap - 40
3) Race preference - Dwarf - I'm starting to like the buggers!
4) Class preference - See above - must use PDK.
5) Melee preference - sword/board or 2-hander
6) Range preference - N/A
7) Weapon preference - Morningstar or Spear (unless you can work in another Weapon Proficiency - this guy is feat-starved.
8) Maximum item enhancement - +5
9) Spellcasting - Damage Shields. buffs and (if Wiz/Sorc) Bigby's/Fingers of Death.
10) Custom factors - none, except want to use PDK

posts.content: My mistake - I failed to use the search engine and discover the dozens of WIZ. SOR & BD/DwD combos there. I should have known that there is nothing original in NWN anymore!
